comment.brief: The value oscillates from Low to High in a sinusoidal shape
comment.full: The value oscillates from Low to High in a sinusoidal shape

comment.brief: The value is linearly interpolated from Low to High  and High to Low
comment.full: The value is linearly interpolated from Low to High  and High to Low

comment.brief: The value is linearly interpolated from Low to High and then jumps back to Low. This is useful for repeated animations in a single direction.
comment.full: The value is linearly interpolated from Low to High and then jumps back to Low. This is useful for repeated animations in a single direction.

comment.brief: The value switches between Low and High
comment.full: The value switches between Low and High

comment.brief: The shape of the waveform used in the cycle.
comment.full: The shape of the waveform used in the cycle.
